homePage.sliderBtnNext: #app > main > div.section.section--first > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div.hero-row__slider > div > div.carousel-slider.swiper-container-initialized.swiper-container-horizontal > div.swiper-button-next.ic-chevron-down
homePage.sliderBtnPrev: #app > main > div.section.section--first > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div.hero-row__slider > div > div.carousel-slider.swiper-container-initialized.swiper-container-horizontal > div.swiper-button-prev.ic-chevron-down

header.favDrop: #app > header > div.g-header > div.h-panel-hide > div > div.h-panel-search > div.h-wrap > div.h-bar > div.h-added-drop.h-drop.js-drop-select.active > div.h-drop__body > div > p
header.favNum: #app > header > div.g-header > div.h-panel-hide > div > div.h-panel-search > div.h-wrap > div.h-bar > div:nth-child(2) > div.n-item.js-drop-select-trigger > div.n-item__icon.ic-favorite > span

login.accountBtn: #app > header > div.g-header > div.h-panel-top > div > div > div.h-controls > a > div
login.nameInput: #app > div:nth-child(16) > div > div.modal-popup__body > div.modal-popup-form > form > div:nth-child(1) > input
login.passwordInput: #app > div:nth-child(16) > div > div.modal-popup__body > div.modal-popup-form > form > div:nth-child(2) > input
login.loginBtn: #app > div:nth-child(16) > div > div.modal-popup__body > div.modal-popup-form > form > div:nth-child(4) > button
